Tanks

Class Wind

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Wind

  • public class Wind
extends java.lang.Object
    The Wind class simulates wind effects in the game, including random wind changes and displaying the current wind direction and strength.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wind(PApplet app)
      Constructs a Wind object and initializes the wind direction and images.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(PApplet app, float x, float y)
      Displays the wind direction and strength on the screen.
      float getCurrentWind()
      Gets the current wind value scaled by the wind force scaling factor.
      PImage getWindImage()
      Gets the appropriate wind image based on the current wind direction.
      void updateWind()
      Updates the wind direction and strength with a random change.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wind

        public Wind(PApplet app)
        Constructs a Wind object and initializes the wind direction and images.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance used to load images.

    • Method Detail

      • updateWind

        public void updateWind()
        Updates the wind direction and strength with a random change.

      • getCurrentWind

        public float getCurrentWind()
        Gets the current wind value scaled by the wind force scaling factor.
        Returns:
        The current wind value.

      • getWindImage

        public PImage getWindImage()
        Gets the appropriate wind image based on the current wind direction.
        Returns:
        The PImage representing the wind direction.

      • display

        public void display(PApplet app,
                    float x,
                    float y)
        Displays the wind direction and strength on the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance used for drawing.
        x - The x-coordinate where the wind information is displayed.
        y - The y-coordinate where the wind information is displayed.
